html:
2.12.19  5:31 pm   why did your voice sound so different when you were talking about greenland or is that just me 

     i was impersonating traditional television broadcast journalism

2.12.19  5:27 pm   the new project was pretty good, sorta like a mini-history of the world thing. are some of your next projects going to be similar since you said that this was to soften the blow of the next ones?

     yes

2.12.19  5:26 pm   Bill, you are a delightful and wonderful human person. Are you really planning for today's majestic frolic of a video to be part of a series?

     yes

      (If not you still have my undying love, just wondering)

2.12.19  5:22 pm   when will you talk about velcro?

     right away

      because I need

2.12.19  5:22 pm   did this new video give you nostalgia or horrible flashbacks of HoTEWIG?

     flash forwards to the many exciting things left to be discovered in this format, and also some night terrors about the lack of a coherent topic for this one

2.12.19  5:18 pm   'aztec' rhymes with 'smashed it'. was that the point?

     no, but 'smashed it' was supposed to rhyme with 'smashed it' for sure

2.12.19  5:10 pm   any hobby suggestion for me?

     not for you specifically because i don't know anything about you, but i will have to give you one i would recomend for anyone which is problem solving

2.12.19  5:08 pm   do you hate having to set up an account to search pinterest?

     i've never done it

2.12.19  4:37 pm   do you prefer music in games on the super nintendo or sega genesis?

           i'm more familiar with super nintendo than sega genesis, but i would expect them both to be good. they both have a job to do, which is to make the game good

2.12.19  4:37 pm   2.11.19  3:37 pm is antarctica really in the title? 

     no

2.12.19  3:59 pm   how do i find the best chords for my melody

     just find the harmonies 1 note at a time. go thorugh the entire song and add just 1 note to 1 moment. see if you can find that special moment that really needs it, and find out which note it needs. I'll give you one to get started. "Celebrate good times come on", that party song from the 70s. playing that vocal part all the way through, no band, no harmony, and i have to decide 1 moment to add 1 note. i'm gonna say for "come on", not the first but every 2nd and 4th time of "come on" in the choruses, let's add a maj 3rd above the voc melody. so if the song is in Ab, let's add the C note above "come on", not the first time but the second and 4th time it occurs in the choruses. ok now you pick a song, with just the melody, and pick what you think is the most important spot to add 1 note to. or if you want, you can find another one for the song i did

2.12.19  3:04 pm   Do you believe in karma? 

     not necessary. karma always believes in itself

2.12.19  2:37 pm   I think something happened. What do I do?

     something

     it is not far off from the contents of the video

     i forget

2.12.19  1:38 pm   why does the sun shine?

     to see what happens

2.12.19  1:09 pm   have you ever hypnotized yiurself ?

     well i have been hypnotized for quite some time, and it sounds like something i would do. the motive is certainly there

2.12.19  1:08 pm   Will you make a sequel to your song "2010" in 2020?

     every song i have written since then is a sequel to it

2.12.19  12:56 pm   why am i like this?

     for this reason

2.12.19  12:21 pm   2.9.19  5:59 pm so how do you strike balance?

     i still have no idea

     or what's the motivation behind prompting you to prefer one over the other?

     i desperately would prefer to have my greatest work be released on a very constant and steady basis. i also am beginning to think i have a physical need to sleep once a day

2.12.19  11:50 am   What's your favorite math

     1 and 2

2.12.19  11:47 am   what is the next video's theme

     a song

2.12.19  11:28 am   When will you release the Bill Wurtz preset for Final Cut Pro?

     step 1 for me would be to use final cut pro in the first place

2.12.19  11:18 am   how to unsad

     joy unboxing

2.12.19  11:07 am   Thoughts on NYC?

     it somehow has a tendency to behave as capital of the world despite not being capital its own country nor even of its own state

2.12.19  10:49 am   are you left handed

     i suppose it's possible

2.12.19  10:32 am   do you have any advice for a musician trying to find an audience? 

     audiences love products. like a full product with sight, sound, reasons, meanings, stories, ideas, ..... . ... a full meal plate. So essentially you have to either build all that yourself or join in with someone else's product already underway. But it's never too soon to start playing to an imaginary audience

2.12.19  9:35 am   birds?

     that is a compelling line of reasoning right there

2.12.19  9:12 am   do you have coffee-making implements

     no

2.12.19  6:16 am   I have periods where I can sit down and write, and the ideas just seem to flow. But other times, often when I'm feeling low or slightly dampened, I can sit with my guitar and nothing seems to happen. I can come up with ideas, but I just don't see them as being as good as when I feel inspired. Are my ideas actually not as good when I feel down, or is it just my perception of them?

     you may not know until later

      Shall I just write anyway?

     yes

2.12.19  6:12 am   Has anyone guessed the title correctly from the anagram?

     i don't think so

      Is that really an anagram of the title?

     yes

2.12.19  5:43 am   What is your opinion on unrestricted submarine warfare? 

     looks like an opportunity for some fresh restrictions

2.12.19  5:20 am   do you like sharks??

     they're ok

2.12.19  3:48 am   How are you doing?

     good

2.12.19  1:28 am   Approximately how many days until your new video is complete?

     who cares

2.12.19  1:14 am   have you considered making a schedule to schedule when you can fuck and unfuck the schedule

     the schedule is for the schedule to never get fucked

2.11.19  10:08 pm   What is the point of the universe?

     to see what kind of points it can have

2.11.19  8:48 pm   hey hey hey, the miller-urey experiment was a joke ok

no one can solve abiogenesis because its never been observed or successfully tested

do you believe in a deity mr wurtz

     what the heck is a deity, please don't call me mr. wurtz

      in a universe that has to have a beginning yet nothing to make it begin, with life that has to have a beginning yet nothing to make it begin, it doesnt seem so unreasonable that perhaps something outside of limited naturalistic understanding could have been the cause - would you agree

     why wouldn't it be natural

      do you think you could go about proving something unscientific with science

     i thought science just means 'what the heck is really going on here' so by whatever means you can get there that would technically be science, even if it indeed takes you to heck

      do you think very very complex interdependent system arose from chance

     no chance necessary when everything is/was/could/would be there and not, etc

      as the drake equation and fermi paradox demonstrate, the chance of intelligent life being able to exist (assuming abiogenesis and macro-evolution are factual phenomenon) is literally astronomically low

     that may be true, but conscious conversations such as this one are 100% biased to only occur in living situations. so therefore no matter how infinitely rare life is, we will instantly find our conversation to exist in that exact rare place. because life is simply not something non-living people talk about

     this universe is fairly convenient in my opinion,

     well of course our world is convenient to us, everything is convenient to itself

      though i think the smartest thing anyone can do is admit they dont know

2.11.19  8:01 pm   Bill I'm worried where is the next vid?

     right here

2.11.19  7:54 pm   ay, when you tour, can you think about coming to/somewhere near to michigan?

     sure

     not really

     no

2.11.19  6:11 pm   2.8.19 11:45 am   what about the mean people who are not nice

     it's hard to tell if anyone is nice or not nice. all you really know for sure is whether or not their relationship with you is nice

     so they can be strong and fast

     see if you can get on one

     of

     draw a diagram

     fruit

     yes but it sucks
